title: set theory - Isomorphisms mod nonstationary
body: Suppose $G \subseteq \mathrm{Add}(\omega_1)$ is generic over $V$ . Let $X_i = \{ \alpha : G(\alpha) = i \}$ . Is it true that $P(X_0)/\mathrm{NS} \cong P(X_1)/\mathrm{NS}$ ? set-theory lo.logic forcing Share Cite Improve this question Follow asked Aug 3, 2020 at 17:25 Monroe Eskew 21.1k 5 5 gold badges 62 62 silver badges 130 130 bronze badges $\endgroup$ Add a comment  |  0 Sorted by: Reset to default Highest score (default) Date modified (newest first) Date created (oldest first) You must log in to answer this question.
